name: Mea's Castle
description:
A tiny Metroidvania-like Platformer: You need to find the legendary "Cup of Hope". Through the Game you'll gain Powerups which will help you to find new ways and avoid Enemies...

Controls:

  Arrows: Move
  Z/C: Button O
  X/V: Button X
  P/Enter: Pause-Menu

Feedback is also appreciated :)

I hope you enjoy the game!
